Gallery.Name: Mind Map
Gallery.Description: Create mind maps (graphical representations of thought processes) for brainstorming, problem solving, rational analysis, and decision marking.

Template.Name: Mind Map
Template.Description: Create mind maps to represent ideas and concepts.

Template.Name: Right Map
Template.Description: Create mind maps with right hierarchical layout.

Template.Name: Tree Map
Template.Description: Tree map is ideal for displaying large amounts of hierarchically structured information.

Template.Name: Tree Map Right
Template.Description: Tree map is ideal for displaying large amounts of hierarchically structured information.

Template.Name: Org Chart
Template.Description: Organizational chart shows the structure of an organization and the relationships and relative ranks of its parts and positions.

Template.Name: Fishbone
Template.Description: Fishbone diagrams is used to find out the root cause of an issue. It can also be called as Cause and Effect diagram.

Template.Name: Fishbone Left
Template.Description: Fishbone diagrams is used to find out the root cause of an issue. It can also be called as Cause and Effect diagram.

Template.Name: Horizontal Timeline
Template.Description: Timelines is a kind of code generated from human brain to record past events.

Template.Name: Winding Timeline
Template.Description: Timelines is a kind of code generated from human brain to record past events.

Template.Name: Vertical Timeline
Template.Description: Timelines is a kind of code generated from human brain to record past events.

Template.Name: Circular Map
Template.Description: Circular diagrams are divergent and are used to define, list out or think (brainstorm) events.

Template.Name: Bubble Map
Template.Description: Bubble maps can be used to compare concepts, recognize areas, or apply to planning and development strategies etc.

Template.Name: Sector Map
Template.Description: Sector maps can clearly display well-structured creative ideas.
